newsitem.title: USA: FSA qualifies 12 muni issues for bond insurance.
newsitem.headline: FSA qualifies 12 muni issues for bond insurance.

text.p: Financial Security Assurance said Wednesday it qualified for bond insurance the following 12 municipal issues scheduled for competitive sale today:
--Huntington Beach Public Facilities Authority, Calif., $8 million lease revenue bonds, direct purchase.
--Oxnard Union High School District, Calif., $10 million general obligation bonds.
--Queen Anne's County, Md., $19.56 million public facility bonds.
--University of N.C. Chapel Hill, N.C., $13.695 million revenue bonds.
--East Rochester UFSD, N.Y., $1.2 million school district bonds.
--Ellenville Central School District, N.Y., $12.901 million school district bonds.
--Livingston Manor Central School District, N.Y., $1.25 million school district bonds.
--Panama Central School District, N.Y., $2.265 million GO school bonds.
--West Seneca Central School District, N.Y., $8.75 million school bonds.
--Norfolk, Va., $43.975 million GO capital improvement bonds.
